title: Movie Selector
project_description: Project introducing working with rest API in React, as well as keep practising useState, useEffect, Routers and passing props in React.

title: Book A Workout
project_description: First time introducing to useSelect hook in React. This demo allows you to select your desired workouts in different gym locations at your preferred time.

title: Share a Happy Thought
project_description: Post your happy thoughts and share with the world! Build with React fetching self build rest API

title: Guess Who?
project_description: First project introducing vanilla JavaScript, focusing on practising conditional statement. This is a single player online game, build with JavaScript ES6, CSS and HTML
